results.title: Effects of simvastatin and taurine on delayed cerebral vasospasm following subarachnoid hemorrhage in rabbits.
results.text_hl: Effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Taurine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013654 @@@taurine@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Hypersensitivity_Delayed</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006968 @@@delayed@@@ @DISEASE_Vasospasm_Intracranial @DISEASE_MESH:D020301 @@@cerebral vasospasm@@@ following @DISEASE_Subarachnoid_Hemorrhage @DISEASE_MESH:D013345 @@@subarachnoid hemorrhage@@@ in @SPECIES_9986 @@@rabbits@@@.

citations.NLM: Lin C, Zhao Y, Wan G, Zhu A, Wang H. Effects of simvastatin and taurine on delayed cerebral vasospasm following subarachnoid hemorrhage in rabbits. Exp Ther Med. 2016 Apr;11(4):1355-1360. PMID: 27073449

results.title: Simvastatin impairs humoral and cell-mediated immunity in mice by inhibiting lymphocyte homing, T-cell activation and antigen cross-presentation.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ also suppressed antibody responses to immunization with @GENE_SERPINB1_PS1 @GENE_282665 @@@ovalbumin@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Hypersensitivity_Delayed</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006968 @@@delayed-type hypersensitivity@@@ to allergens.

citations.NLM: Ulivieri C, Fanigliulo D, Benati D, Pasini FL, Baldari CT. Simvastatin impairs humoral and cell-mediated immunity in mice by inhibiting lymphocyte homing, T-cell activation and antigen cross-presentation. Eur J Immunol. 2008 Oct;38(10):2832-44. PMID: 18958884
